name: redis-central-emea-dashboard
description: Central EMEA Go-to-Market Dashboard powered by Redis Cloud

scripts.build: cd central-emea-dashboard/frontend && npm install --no-fund --verbose && npm install -D webpack-cli --no-fund --verbose && npm run build --verbose
scripts.vercel-build: cd central-emea-dashboard/frontend && npm install && npm run build

author: Thomas Gregg
